Period_Activity_TaskObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Period_Activity_TaskObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Period_Activity_TaskObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Period_Activity_Task_Data.description: The ID for the period activity task.  This is the index for the period activity task and will be autopopulated if left blank.

validation.validation: The Period Activity Task Code is currently in use by another Period Activity Task.

Period_Activity_Task_Data.description: The description of a Period Activity Task

Period_Activity_UnitObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Period_Activity_UnitObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Period_Activity_UnitObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Period_Activity_Task_Data.description: The Period Activity Unit associated with this Period Activity Task.

Academic_PeriodObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Academic_PeriodObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Academic_PeriodObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Period_Activity_Task_Data.description: The Academic Period associated with this Period Activity Task.
The Default Unit Quantity used when assigning tasks.

validation.validation: The Default Unit Quantity cannot be 0 when Allow Unit Quantity Override is false.

Period_Activity_Task_Data.description: A boolean value that indicates whether the Default Unit Quantity can be overridden or not on assignment.
Inactive status indicator for this Period Activity Task.
